tool.name: Nmds
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='nmds' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.nmds\.axes$:'$nmds_axes,'^\S+\.nmds\.iters$:'$nmds_iters,'^\S+\.nmds\.stress$:'$stress_nmds --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --phylip="$dist" #if $axes.__str__ != "None" and len($axes.__str__) > 0: --axes="$axes" #end if #if int($mindim.__str__) > 0: --mindim="$mindim" #end if #if int($maxdim.__str__) >= int($mindim.__str__): --maxdim="$maxdim" #end if #if int($iters.__str__) > 0: --iters="$iters" #end if #if int($maxiters.__str__) > 0: --maxiters="$maxiters" #end if #if float($epsilon.__str__) > 0.0: --epsilon="$epsilon" #end if

param.name: iters
param.label: iters - Number of random configuration to try (default 10)

param.name: maxiters
param.label: maxiters - Number of iterations to try with each random configuration (default 500)

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
.. _Mothur: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Main_Page
**Command Documenation**
The nmds_ command generates non-metric multidimensional scaling data from a phylip_distance_matrix_.
.. _phylip_distance_matrix: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Phylip-formatted_distance_matrix .. _nmds: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Nmds
v1.20.0: Updated to mothur 1.33
